colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

defaultIndex.description: The initial index(es) of the accordion item to expand.

icon.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | ((props: { ...; }) => ReactNode)
icon.description: The accordion icon for all items to use.

iconHidden.description: If `true`, hide the accordion icon for all items.

index.description: The index(es) of the accordion item to expand.

isMultiple.description: If `true`, multiple accordion items can be expanded at once.

isToggle.description: If `true`, any expanded accordion item can be collapsed again.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when accordion items are expanded or collapsed.

icon.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | ((props: { ...; }) => ReactNode)

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the accordion item will be disabled.

label.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | ((props: { ...; }) => ReactNode)

animationOpacity.description: If `true`, the opacity of the content will be animated.

endingHeight.description: The height you want the content in its expanded state.

startingHeight.description: The height you want the content in its collapsed state.

unmountOnExit.description: If `true`, the element will unmount when `isOpen={false}` and animation is done.
